CREATE UNIQUE INDEX AK_TABLE (I_MOD,TABLE_NAME) ON SNP_TABLE
UPDATE SNP_ID SET ID_NEXT = (SELECT MAX(I_VAL) FROM SNP_VAR_DATA) WHERE ID_TBL = 'SNP_VAR_DATA'
